attributes.action: Continue free lateral flow test availability for all UK residents
attributes.additional_details: We need the government to continue free lateral flow tests for ALL UK residents.
attributes.background:
As of 1st April 2022, the government is stopping universal free lateral flow tests.
At the same time it is estimated that around one in sixteen UK residents have Covid-19, retailers are planning in charging at least £2 a test, and we have the worst cost of living crisis on record.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609448
